page.title: 14Education
page.content:
Fellside Primary School building still stands but since 1944 children have travelled to Caldbeck for their initial schooling. There is a play school for the 3 year olds and at 5 they start in the primary school. At 11+ they move to the mixed ability Caldew School at Dalston (13km).
Residents attend evening classes in Caldbeck and sometimes in Fellside school. The main centres are in Dalston (13km) or Wigton (16km).
OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES: Fellside Mansion, owned by the Cumbria Education Authority, caters for outdoor activities (fell-walking, orienteering ski-ing etc) for school groups. High Greenrigg House caters privately for small groups following art, music and geology courses.
